creator: josias.thoeny@wyona.org
text:
In Lenya trunk, the image/asset upload and the link lookup in BXE fail with the
following error:

Error compiling assets_xsp

Line 159, column 0: The method getResourcesManager() is undefined for the type
Document
Line 160, column 0: Type mismatch: cannot convert from Resource[] to File[]
Line 160, column 0: The method getResources(Document) in the type
ResourcesManager is not applicable for the arguments ()
Line 364, column 0: The method getMetaFile(File) is undefined for the type
ResourcesManager
	at
org.apache.cocoon.components.language.programming.java.JavaLanguage.compile(JavaLanguage.java:226)
	at
org.apache.cocoon.components.language.programming.CompiledProgrammingLanguage.load(CompiledProgrammingLanguage.java:173)
	at
org.apache.cocoon.components.language.generator.ProgramGeneratorImpl.loadProgram(ProgramGeneratorImpl.java:399)
	... 77 more
this needs to be revamped to no longer rely on the XSP (which will go away shortly)
creator: gregor@apache.org
